content: Yes, gaming mice with laser sensors are generally more expensive than those with optical sensors. This is because laser sensors use more advanced technology, which makes them more precise and capable of tracking on more surfaces. Gaming mice with laser sensors often also come with additional features like customizable RGB lighting, adjustable weights, and programmable buttons, which can further increase their cost. However, it's important to note that there are affordable gaming mice with laser sensors available on the market, so you don't necessarily have to break the bank to get a high-quality and precise gaming mouse.
